DOC.brief_summary: To elucidate influence ethnicity socioeconomic status ( SES ) woman 's cardiovascular health , use recently complete risk factor mortality data Stanford Five-City Project .
DOC.detailed_description: DESIGN NARRATIVE : Two data set use evaluate specific aim : ( 1 ) survey risk factor data ( e.g. , blood pressure , cholesterol , blood lipid , smoking , etc . ) 4500 girls woman ; ( 2 ) surveillance mortality data 1800 woman .
